original_title: This Ain't Avatar XXX 2: Escape from Pandwhora
overview: The Sequel to the AVN award winner!  Take a journey back to the magical world of Pandhora, and enjoy a new sexy adventure full of hot blue creatures in Hustler's long-awaited sequel to the most successful adult 3-D movie ever!
title: This Ain't Avatar XXX 2: Escape from Pandwhora
